scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:bot"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && env DATA_DIR=../data npm run dev
scripts.dev:bot: cd clawdbot && env DATA_DIR=../data npm run dev
scripts.build: npm install --prefix clawdbot && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix web && npm run build --prefix clawdbot && npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix web
